mapper.select: select fstore_name, ftitle, nvl(totalprice,0) totalprice, fimg1 from funding f left join (select f.fid,sum(oitotalprice) totalprice from order_item oi join product_option po on oi.poid=po.poid join funding_product fp on po.fpid=fp.fpid join funding f on f.fid=fp.fid group by f.fid) total on total.fid= f.fid where fstatus = 'funding'and cid='session1' --and tid='1' and ctid = '2' order by fdate;
